About the job
Blue Wireless is a global leader in providing Wireless Network Solutions for Global Enterprises. With global coverage in over 100 countries, we are transforming the way LTE/5G and Starlink technology is used for connect branches, remote sites and vessels using wireless solutions.
Headquartered in Singapore with local operations in Australia, Malaysia, Netherlands, UK and United States, Blue Wireless makes the roll-out of projects a painless and predictable. But technology is only one part of our success story – our "secret sauce" is our people: our creativity, hands-on attitude, and our willingness to go above and beyond for our customers are what keep us growing, hence continuously looking for new colleagues to join and be part of our journey.

Front End Developer
We are looking for a Front-End Developers with 2 years of professional experience to join our growing team. You will be responsible for building user-friendly, responsive and visually appealing web portal interfaces. Together with our Digital Services product manager and developers, you will transform our service portal requirements into high quality digital experiences to delight our enterprise customers.

What’s on your plate?
Develop and maintain responsive, beautiful, high-performance web applications.
Translate UI/UX wireframe on Figma into clean, scalable, and reusable code.
Collaborate with other developers to integrate APIs and Azure services.
Optimize applications for speed, accessibility, and cross-browser compatibility.
Write and maintain unit tests to ensure code quality.
Participate in code reviews, knowledge sharing, and agile ceremonies.
Stay updated with emerging frontend technologies and industry best practices.

If you-
have bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field (or equivalent practical experience).
have minimum 2 years of experience in frontend development
are proficient in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+).
have strong experience with at least one modern framework: React, NextJS and Vue.js.
are familiar with RESTful APIs, JSON, and Git version control.
have experience with build tools (Webpack, Vite, or similar).
are knowledgeable in responsive design, accessibility standards (WCAG), and cross-browser compatibility.
have a sharp eye for design and detail, someone who notices little things that elevate the digital UI/UX user experience.
have a good intuitive sense of balance, proportion, layout and style is a huge plus.
can communicate clearly in English, verbally and in writing with international colleagues.

-we'd love to hear from you.
Joining us is a great opportunity to enhance your professional career globally and make a real impact in a tech company that is growing exponentially in a fast-paced environment. Come grow with us!

You’ll be
Part of a growing team of application developers under the leadership of an application team leader.
Offered career development opportunities such as official Azure certification and mentorship under senior application developers.
Enjoy flexible hybrid work arrangements in a global working environment.
Given the opportunity to make a difference, in helping with the development of the role and the business
In a “destination workplace”: work with great managers, in an ideal workplace, while doing meaningful work
